Pak Ui Chun Meets New Myanmar Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, met and conversed with U Thein Lwin, new Myanmar ambassador to the DPRK, on Wednesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
